name: Brave Builder Construct A Climb
description:
A construction worker gets access to a mysterious tower where many monsters and puzzles are.

Explore a procedurally generated tower as you climb up to the top, every playthrough will be different as the levels shift and change as you explore

Solve ancient match 3 puzzles and defeat various enemies to gain coins and gems to upgrade your character to help you survive your climb

Find out the secrets hidden in this tower , why the monsters exist here, and your connection with it
